statements: DELETE FROM data_anomalies WHERE feature_1 < 0.5 AND feature_2 > 0.7;
DELETE FROM ml_model_training WHERE model_name = 'Random Forest';
DELETE FROM outliers WHERE column1 = 10 AND column2 = 20
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE column3 = 100 AND id = 5
DELETE FROM model_metrics WHERE model_name = 'Random Forest';
DELETE FROM model_parameters WHERE model_name = 'RegressionModel' AND parameter_name = 'LearningRate';
DELETE FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Outlier' AND data_value > 100;
